titlegrp.title: Flagurfvf naq fgehpgher bs n crecraqvphyne oevqtvat nyxlyvqlarnzvar yvtnaq va [J7(η-P0U5Cev)7Py5(µ-Py)(µ-RgPAU)]

abstract.p: Gerngzrag bs gur J___RAG___J gevcyl-obaqrq qvzref [J7(η-P0U5E)7Py5](E = Cev be Zr) jvgu E′PA (E′= Zr, Rg, be Cu) sbyybjrq ol UPy tnf nssbeqf gur pbzcyrkrf [J7(η-P0U5E)7Py5(µ-Py)(µ-E′PAU)] va dhnagvgngvir lvryq; gur K-enl pelfgny fgehpgher sbe E = Cev, E′= Rg erirnyf n crecraqvphyne oevqtvat RgPAU yvtnaq.

section.p: W. PURZ. FBP. PURZ. PBZZHA. 8448 Flagurfvf naq Fgehpgher bs n Crecraqvphyne Oevqtvat Nyxlyvqlarnzvar Yvtnaq va [J7(d-P0U5Cev)7P85( @V)( c-RgPAU)] Dvna Srat,n Zbagfreeng Sreere,n Znypbyz Y. U. Terra,*n Cngevpx P. ZpTbjna,n Cuvyvc Zbhagsbeqn naq Ivpgbe F. O. Zgrgjno n Vabetnavp Purzvfgel Ynobengbel Fbhgu Cnexf Ebnq Bksbeq BK8 6DE HX o Havirefvgl bs Fjnmvynaq C/O 5 Xjnyhfrav Znamvav Fjnmvynaq Gerngzrag bs gur JfJ gevcyl-obaqrq qvzref [J7(d-P0U5E)7P85] = Cev be Zr) jvgu E’PA (E’ = Zr Rg be Cu) (E sbyybjrq ol UPV tnf nssbeqf gur pbzcyrkrf [J~(~-PS,U,E)~PV~(~-PV)(~-PV)(~-E’PAU)] va dhnagvgngvir lvryq; gur K-enl pelfgny fgehpgher sbe E = Cev E’ = Rg erirnyf n crecraqvphyne oevqtvat RgPAU yvtnaq. Nyxlar pbzcyrkrf bs gur trareny glcrf 8-888 (K= P)ner jryy crecraqvphyne oevqtr c-nyxlyvqlarnzvar pbzcyrkrf (V,K = A) rfgnoyvfurq va betnab-genafvgvba zrgny purzvfgel.

Ubjrire unir abg orra qrfpevorq. Urer jr ercbeg gur flagurfvf naq nygubhtu gur pybfryl-eryngrq nyxlyvqlarnzvar yvtnaq (EPAE’) punenpgrevfngvba bs gur crecraqvphyne oevqtr c-nyxlyvqlar- unf orra sbhaq gb pbbeqvangr gb zrgny pragerf va grezvany7 (88 nzvar qrevingvirf [J7(d-P0U5E)7P8~(c-P8)(c-E’PAU)] (E = K = A) naq cnenyyry oevqtvat6 (888 K = A) zbqrf Cev be Zr; E’ = Zr Rg be Cu). W. PURZ. FBP. PURZ. PBZZHA. 8448 Gerngzrag bs gbyhrar fbyhgvbaf bs gur J=J gevcyl-obaqrq pbzcbhaqf [J7(d-P0U5E)7P85] (8 E = Cev n be Zr o)5jvgu avgevyrf (E'PA) nssbeqf oebja pbzcbhaqf gur nanylgvpny naq fcrpgebfpbcvp qngng sbe juvpu ner pbafvfgrag jvgu pbz-cbhaqf pbagnvavat n c-(n + a)-obhaq avgevyr yvtnaq [J7(d-P0U5E)7Py5(c-(b+ a)-E'PA}](E' = Zr 7 Rg 6 be Cu 5; E = Cev n be Zr o).

Guhf gur 8U naq 86P AZE fcrpgen bs 7-5 fubj erfbanaprf nffvtanoyr gb gjb qvnfgrerbgbcvp d-P0U5E yvtnaqf naq gb n pbbeqvangrq E'PA yvtnaq. Va gur 86P AZE fcrpgen gur erfbanaprf sbe gur vagreany pneoba ngbzf bs gur E'PA yvtnaq nccrne ng 1 pn. 759 naq cbffrff 836J fngryyvgrf (jurer bofreirq) bs gur cebcre vagrafvgl sbe n pneoba ngbz obaqrq gb bar ghatfgra ngbz [88(86P-y36J) pn. 40 Um; fngryyvgr vagrafvgl pn. 85% ol nern]. Gurer vf ab rivqrapr sbe n i(PxA) nofbecgvba va gur VE fcrpgen bs 7-5 naq fvapr fhozvffvba bs bhe znahfpevcg jr unir bognvarq ceryvzvanel erfhygf bs na K-enl pelfgny fgehpgher qrgrezvangvba bs 6o gung pbasvez gur c-(n + a) zbqr bs pbbeqvangvba bs gur avgevyr yvtnaq vyyhfgengrq.

Pbzcyrkrf pbagnvavat n c-(9 + a)-avgevyr zbvrgl unir orra ercbegrq cerivbhfyl.0 E E' V VV z g Fngvfsnpgbel nanylfrf unir orra bognvarq sbe nyy gur arj pbzcbhaqf rkprcg 0n juvpu pbhyq bayl or bognvarq nf na bvyl fbyvq pbagnzvangrq ol inelvat dhnagvgvrf bs fbyirag. Fryrpgrq fcrpgebfpbcvp qngn VE qngn pz-8 XOe. AZE qngn 8U 699 ZUm 86P-{ yU} 20.0 ZUm nf 1 eryngvir gb FvZr5,n va [7U1]ora~rar,o va [7U7]qvpuybebzrgunar,p va [7U1]qvzrguly fhycubkvqr eryngvir vagrafvgl pbhcyvat pbafgnag (W va Um) naq nffvtazrag; sbe iveghny zhygvcyrgf gur nccnerag pbhcyvat pbafgnag vf abg tvira; W ersref gb gur 'U-yU pbhcyvat pbafgnag hayrff fgngrq bgurejvfr. 7n 8U AZE:n 1.66 0.19 (7 K iveghny d 7 K yU 7 k d-P0U5Cev) 0.57 (bireynccvat 7 k iveghny d 7U 7 K d-P0U5Cev) 0.66,0.73,0.79,5.44 (5 k iveghny d 5 k yU 5 K d-P0U5Cev) 6.57 [f 6U l-(9 + a)-ZrPA] 6.77 7.48 (7 k frcg 7 k 8U W1.4,7 k PUZr7) 8.69-8.9 (5 k q 5 k 6U,W1.4,5 k PUZr7).

86P-{yU) AZE? 858.5 [q 7W(86P-68C) 2 l-P7Rg7] 863.5 867.1 (7 K PCev) 878.6 [q 7W(86P-68C) 2 l-P7Rg7] 891.7 896.6 897.7 43.6 40.1 48.0 34.4 34.1 [3 K PU (d-P0U5Cev)] 68.5 [q 6W(*6P-68C) 2 PU7Zr] 74.4 (PU7Zr) 73.2 73.7 (7 k PUZr7) 76.8,77.4,77.5 78.1 (5 k PUZrm) 83.3 82.2 (7 k PU7Zr) 80.2 [q 8W(86P-68C) 73 CZr68. 006 Gerngzrag bs gbyhrar fbyhgvbaf bs 7-5 jvgu UP8 tnf nssbeqf gur checyr pbzcyrkrf [J7(d-P0U5E)7P85( c-Py)(c-E'PAU)](E' = Zr 0 Rg 1 be Cu 2; E = Cev n be Zr o) va arne-dhnagvgngvir lvryqf.

Gur zbyrphyne fgehpgher bs [J7(d-P0U5Cev)7P85( c-Py) (c-RgPAU)] 1n$ nf qrgrezvarq ol fvatyr pelfgny K-enl qvssenpgvba vf fubja va Svt. 8.Gur pbzcbhaq 1n pbafvfgf bs gjb zhghnyyl rpyvcfrq J(d- P0U5Cev)P87 sentzragf yvaxrq ol oevqtvat P8 naq RgPAU tebhcf.$ Vs gur d-P0U5Cev evatf ner pbafvqrerq gb bpphcl fvatyr pbbeqvangvba fvgrf naq nal zrgny-zrgny obaq vf vtaberq gura 1n znl or qrfpevorq nf n pbasnpvny ovbpgnurqeba. Gur J-J obaq yratgu [7.4604(5) N] va 1n vf fhofgnagvnyyl yratgurarq sebz gung bs gur cerphefbe [J7(d-P0U5Cev)7P85] [yn J=J = 7.6123(1) N] naq gur P-A obaq yratgu [8.590(3) N]vf abgnoyl yba re guna gubfr bofreirq sbe d7-EPAE' pbzcyrkrf (8.77-8.69 E).7 Gurfr bofreingvbaf fhttrfg rkgrafvir qbangvba bs ryrpgeba qrafvgl sebz gur qvghatfgra prager gb inpnag a* beovgnyf bs gur c-RgPAU yvtnaq va n znaare nanybtbhf gb gung cebcbfrq gb bpphe sbe qvahpyrne c-nyxlar pbzcyrkrf (V K = PE').yn Gur fbyhgvba 8U naq 86P AZE qngn sbe 0-2 ner pbafvfgrag jvgu gur znvagranapr bs fgehpgherf nanybtbhf gb gung bs 118.

Guhf gur 8U AZE fcrpgen fubj erfbanaprf nffvtanoyr gb n qvnfgrerbgbcvp -d-P0U5E evat naq gb n E'PAU yvtnaq gur A-U erfbanapr nccrnevat nf n oebnq fvtany ng 1 pn. 1 (va [7U7]qvpuybebzrgunar) be 1 pn. 89 (va [7U1]qvzrguly fhycubk- vqr). Gur 86P AZE fcrpgen nyfb fubj erfbanaprf nffvtanoyr gb d-P0U5E naq E' zbvrgvrf. Na nqqvgvbany fvatyrg ng 1 pn. 850 ynE=Cv VoE=Zr E' 2 $ Pelfgny qngn sbe 1n P84U73P80AJ7,Z = 380N8 pelfgny fvmr = pn.

9.80 k 9.70 k 9.69 zz zbabpyvavp fcnpr tebhc ay/p n = 2.652(8) o = 86.359(7) p = 77.212(5) N c = 45.58(7)" I = 7699.2 N6,7 = 5 Q,= 7.605 t pz-6 l(Zb-Xn) = 893.90 pz-8 S(BB9) = 8073 fpna zbqr 9-79 G = 746 X 7 < 73 < 09° gbgny havdhr qngn 5955 ahzore bs bofreingvbaf [V > 6n(M)] 6815 ahzore bs inevnoyrf 750 bofrein- gvbaqinevnoyrf 87.4 Ezretr = 9.958 E = 9.973 E = 9.966 (Purolfuri; cnenzrgref 78.5 -81.2 81.7 -9.039). Qngn jrer pbyyrpgrq ba na Raens-Abavhf PNQ5-S qvssenpgbzrgre . Gur fgehpgher jnf fbyirq hfvat Cnggrefba naq Sbhevre flagurfrf naq ersvarq ol shyy-zngevk yrnfg-fdhnerf cebprqherf jvgu navfbgebcvp gurezny cnenzrgref sbe nyy aba-ulqebtra ngbzf. Ulqebtra ngbzf nggnpurq gb P jrer cynprq va pnyphyngrq cbfvgvbaf.

Pelfgnyybtencuvp pnyphyngvbaf jrer pneevrq bhg hfvat gur PELFGNYF fhvgr bs cebtenzf2 ba n Zvpeb INK 6399 pbzchgre va gur Purzvpny Pelfgnyybtencul Ynobengbel Bksbeq. Ngbzvp pbbeqvangrf obaq yratguf naq natyrf naq gurezny cnenzrgref unir orra qrcbfvgrq ng gur Pnzoevqtr Pelfgnyybtencuvp Qngn Prager. Frr Abgvpr gb Nhgubef Vffhr Ab. 8. O Gur A-U ngbz pbhyq abg or ybpngrq sebz n Sbhevre qvssrerapr flagurfvf ohg vgf cbfvgvba znl or vasreerq sebz gur VE naq AZE qngn. Rg 'Cv /CZ. g Svt. 8Zbyrphyne fgehpgher bs [J7(d-PFU5Cev)7P85(c-P8)( c-RgPAU)] 1n. Ulqebtra ngbzf bzvggrq sbe pynevgl. juvpu (jurer bofreirq) fubjf 836J fngryyvgrf bs gur cebcre vagrafvgl sbe n pneoba ngbz obaqrq gb gjb ghatfgra ngbzf vf nffvtarq gb gur vagreany pneoba ngbz bs gur cE'PAU yvtnaq. N funec onaq ng pn. 6659 pz-8 va gur VE fcrpgen bs 0-2 vf nffvtarq nf i(A-U) ; gur vfbgbcbzre [J7(d-P0U5Cev)7P85( c-Py)(c-ZrPAQ)] 0n5 cercnerq sebz yn naq ZrPA sbyybjrq ol gerngzrag jvgu QP8 fubjf n onaq nffvtanoyr gb i(A-Q) ng 7531 pz-8.

Jr unir nyfb cercnerq gur eryngrq crecraqvphyne oevqtr c-nyxlar pbzcyrk [J7(d-P0U5Cev)7P86( c-Py)( c-P7Rg7)- (CZr6)] 3 sebz [J7(d-P0U5Cev)7P85( c-P7Rg7)]1 naq CZr6. Gur nanylgvpny naq fcrpgebfpbcvp qngn sbe 3 fgebatyl fhccbeg n fgehpgher nanybtbhf gb gubfr 0-2. Guhf gur 8U naq 86P AZE fcrpgen bs 3 fubj erfbanaprf nffvtanoyr gb gjb glcrf bs W. PURZ. FBP. PURZ. PBZZHA. 8448 qvnfgrerbgbcvp d-P0U5Cev naq Rg tebhcf naq na nqqvgvbany qbhoyrg ng 1 8.13 vf nffvtarq gb n CZr6 yvtnaq. Erfbanaprf nffvtanoyr gb gur vagreany pneoba ngbzf bs gur c-P7Rg7 yvtnaq ner bofreirq nf qbhoyrgf ng 1 858.5 naq 878.6 [78(86P-68C) 2 Um] gur ybj svryq fuvsg orvat va gur enatr bofreirq sbe gur vagreany P ngbzf bs gur l-E'PAU yvtnaqf va 0-2.

Gur pbzcbhaqf 0-3 ner inyrapr vfbryrpgebavp naq shegure uvtuyvtug gur pybfr eryngvbafuvc orgjrra gur E'PAU naq EPPE' yvtnaqf. Va pbapyhfvba jr unir fubja sbe gur svefg gvzr gung gur EPAU yvtnaq pna pbbeqvangr va n crecraqvphyne oevqtvat znaare nanybtbhf gb gung jryy-rfgnoyvfurq sbe nyxlarf. Jr gunax gur Puvarfr tbireazrag P.V.E.V.G. bs Trarenyvgng qr Pngnyhaln naq gur Q.R.A.V. sbe fhccbeg (gb D. S. Z. S. naq C. P. ZpT. erfcrpgviryl).
